body: 我爛人願稱此漫畫為最強
eh where did he said the author won't make a continuation? A tweet or something?
我還以為出已經出第二集了

I want to see the continuation so bad too, but too bad the author decided that, we can only hope they change their mind one day. The thing is in japanese culture, they really respect a creator and hardwork, and they avoid the piracy as much as they can, because they won't tolerate what considered a crime regardless how little it is. So what @JackDanielsx7 you say only applies to us, not them. However, the digital sales reached 20k+ copies, I really really hope they change their mind soon.
Ah dam , that sucks.. I wanted a sequel for this one. But this is the internet . Your stuff gets leaked one way or another.
i wish it got a sequel but the author said their content being leaked being uploaded without their consent said never again
